title: CES 2024 day 3: the 9 best gadgets we've seen, from the LG C4 OLED to neural headphones
description: It's now day three of CES 2024, but the tech discoveries keep on coming – here are all of our highlights from the show floor.

title: ChatGPT gets its equivalent of the App Store – here are the best early GPTs
description: OpenAI's GPT Store has a Featured list at the top, and right now, one of them will recommend nature trails to check out.

title: A new Windows update will let you use your Samsung Galaxy phone as a laptop webcam
description: Users will soon be able to use their Samsung Galaxy phone as a webcam for their Windows laptop.

title: The Asus Zenbook Duo 2024 is the world's first dual-screen OLED laptop
description: The laptop supports multiple viewing configurations that can combine the two screens into one 19.8-inch display.

title: Microsoft hopes Android users ditch Chrome for Edge by powering up Copilot
description: Microsoft recently gave its Copilot AI tool the ability to analyze and understand images - and it's bringing the feature to Edge's Android app.

title: Obscure Canadian startup wants you to connect four monitors to your laptop in a bid to boost your productivity — great for those looking to create their own hydra workstation
description: Portable Monitor lets you connect two of its devices to your laptop using USB-C to give you five interconnected displays in total.

title: Even wireless tools aren't safe from ransomware attacks
description: Researchers found multiple vulnerabilities on intranet-connected wrenches.

title: Google and Samsung just made sharing files on Android much easier
description: By teaming up with Samsung, Google is bringing the former's Quick Share feature to other Android devices.

title: One of the world's largest SSD makers has just announced something that could make SSDs obsolete one day — Micron's FeRAM technology is faster, sturdier than NAND but consumers will miss out for now
description: NVDRAM is Micron's take on Ferroelectric RAM (FeRAM), and it's aimed at industrial applications for now.

title: The best wearable and fitness tech of CES 2024
description: Here's the best wearable and fitness tech we've seen and tested at CES 2024.

title: These new Intel drivers for Windows 11 fix a major Wi-Fi problem – so download them now
description: Intel has just released new Wi-Fi and Bluetooth drivers to bat off the always-scary BSOD.

title: Resident Evil 2 and Hardspace: Shipbreaker are joining the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog this month
description: The lineup of games joining the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for January 2024 has been revealed.

title: Fake "hack-back" offers are putting ransomware victims at further risk
description: Fraudsters are now going after ransomware victims, offering to return stolen data for a price - but surprise surprise, it's a scam.

title: There's a massive Fitbit sale at Amazon - shop the 5 best deals starting at just $49
description: Amazon is having a massive Fitbit sale, and I'm rounding up the best deals on Fitbit's best-selling activity trackers and smartwatches with prices from just $49.

title: Lil Guardsman is coming to PC and consoles this month, inspired by Papers, Please and Night in the Woods
description: Hilltop Studios has announced that Lil Guardsman is coming to PC and console on January 23.

title: How to watch Wild Cards online – release dates and times
description: Cop crime drama with a comedic edge stars Vanessa Morgan and Giacomo Gianniotti. Here's how to watch Wild Cards online from anywhere now.

title: The best smart home tech of CES 2024: fresh ideas from Philips, Samsung and more
description: CES 2024 is in full swing and it's delivered lots of impressive smart home tech – here's our pick of the best launches so far.

title: Cyberattacks are having fatal consequences, so the White House wants hospital funding tied to hospital security
description: The White House is looking to stop hospitals from bleeding data, but will a cyber tourniquet be enough?

title: I just had a demo of the world's first wearable oven, and I was dumb enough to stick my hand inside
description: The Willcook can slow-cook your meal using just five volts of power, but I wasn't convinced until I got my fingers burned.

title: Shuji Utsumi is the new President and COO of Sega as well as CEO of Sega of America and Europe
description: Shuji Utsumi has been appointed President and COO at Sega, as well as CEO of Sega of America and Sega Europe.

title: Honor’s new ‘intent-based UI’ lets you order food and taxis with just one swipe
description: Honor has unveiled its Android 14-based Magic OS 8 update, which introduces a host of AI-powered navigation features.

title: Microsoft is adding ChatGPT-powered AI to its iconic Notepad app - but does it need it?
description: Microsoft is integrating GPT-4 AI into the Windows 11 Notepad app , introducing an AI writing assistant bot for smarter text editing. Windows observers find hints of credit system and usage limits.

title: Chinese hackers claim to have found a way to crack Apple AirDrop and find out email addresses, phone numbers
description: Chinese law enforcement hijack AirDrop to discover activists sharing anti-government content and discussing protests.

title: Samsung shows off a Galaxy Buds case with an OLED screen – has no plans to release it
description: Samsung has made a prototype Galaxy Buds case with an OLED screen but does it need one?

title: SAG-AFTRA announces deal with AI company to create and license ‘digital voice replicas’ for use in video games
description: SAG-AFTRA has announced an agreement with AI company Replica Studios to allow voice actors to create and license "digital voice replicas" for use in video games.

title: Ukraine Blackjack hackers take down Moscow ISP in revenge for Kyivstar attack, but apparently they’re just warming up
description: Trading blows with the Russian bear, Blackjack scores a hit.

title: HP is being sued again over blocking third-party ink
description: Preventing customers from being able to use third-party ink is proving expensive for HP, financially and reputationally.

title: SEC Twitter account hacked, apparently didn't have 2FA enabled
description: The SEC has confirmed that its X account was hacked to send false tweets on its Bitcoin decision, thanks to a stolen phone number.

title: Space cybersecurity: a blueprint for success in unchartered territory
description: Learn the five best practices you should use to bolster satellite security and protect space IP.

title: Asus’ ROG Phone 8 is made to go beyond gaming with boosted cameras and flagship specs
description: Asus’ ROG Phone 8 is a supercharged phone that's ready to go beyond gaming with proper cameras, great specs, and a more understated design.

title: Amazon lays off 'hundreds' of movie and TV employees ahead of Prime Video ads debut
description: Amazon has reportedly let many streaming-based staffers go, despite its forthcoming and potentially lucrative Prime Video ads-supported plan.

title: How Chrome’s Manifest V3 will change the game for ad blockers
description: Chrome's Manifest V3 changes ad blockers' functioning, sparking industry-wide debate and adaptation -  and why there’s no need to panic.

title: Fidelity National Financial attack saw hackers steal data on over a million customers
description: Approximately 1.3 million Fidelity customers now thought to have been affected by ALPHV ransomware attack.

title: Ottobot Brew is the beer dispensing robot of my dreams
description: Ottonomy is actually unveiling two new Ottobots at CES – but the draught beer-toting one is of most interest (to me).

title: Reports claim Twitch is planning huge layoffs with up to 500 people affected
description: A report from Bloomberg claims that streaming service Twitch is planning to lay off around 500 people.

title: Twitch lays off over 500 people in huge layoffs
description: Twitch has now confirmed that it has laid off over 500 people in a "difficult decision."

title: Overwatch 2 Illari temporarily removed from competitive after players discover an infinite ammo bug
description: Overwatch 2 hero Illari has been temporarily removed from competitive play due to an infinite ammo glitch.

title: Our Flag Means Death runs aground as queer pirate comedy Max show cancelled after 2 seasons
description: Max's beloved comedy pirate series has been sunk by Warner Bros. Discovery after two highly-rated seasons.

title: This smart mattress topper uses AI to boost sleep and help your body recover faster
description: The Rezet mattress topper promises to provide both personalized health plans and the most restful night sleep.

title: AI is helping China-backed hackers but it’s also helping to hunt them down, NSA says
description: Generative AI can help you draft an email or re-write a document, but it can also help breach a network and attack infrastructure.

title: The Apple Vision Pro likely has more memory and storage than your MacBook
description: Apple could pack the Vision Pro with 16GB RAM and 1TB storage – making its base MacBooks look even worse.

title: Society of the Snow is Netflix's first movie hit of 2024, but don't sleep on this action thriller
description: The survival thriller topped Netflix's film chart, but it shouldn't be the only movie you watch on the streaming giant this week.

title: Co-working spaces might actually be a security nightmare
description: Choosing to work from a co-working location could be your worst decision when it comes to cybersecurity.

title: Want faster frame rates for free? Intel’s tech to boost game performance is coming to more of its CPUs
description: Previously Intel said its APO tech would be exclusive to 14th-gen chips, but that has now changed, thankfully.

title: Amazon announces an AirPlay alternative that'll be open to everyone with a Fire TV
description: Amazon is bringing Matter open casting to its Fire TVs and Echo Show 15 to combat Chromecast and AirPlay exclusivity.

title: Destiny 2 PvP modifier Checkmate being 'moved back to Labs' as Bungie makes changes
description: Bungie is making changes to Destiny 2's PvP modifier Checkmate following player feedback.

title: UK businesses are actually leading the way when it comes to AI usage
description: Many British enterprises have already deployed AI, and even more are “actively” looking into it, IBM study finds.

title: Last-minute Samsung Galaxy S24 leak teases potentially crucial display upgrade
description: The latest Samsung Galaxy S24 leak predicts a screen touch response speed increase for all three upcoming models.

title: Sonus Faber's Suprema speaker system costs the same as 16 new Tesla Model 3s
description: The Suprema system "embodies the peak of luxury and the ultimate experience for audio and design enthusiasts".

title: Google Chromecast is getting a huge upgrade – here's what’s new
description: If you've got Pixel hardware or you spend a lot of time on TikTok, these new Chromecast features will interest you.

title: Lenovo shows off its hand-powered mouse and keyboard combo at CES 2024 - and I’m in love
description: Lenovo could release a sustainable mouse and keyboard that will be powered by... you!

title: This clever Apple Watch strap brings gesture controls to your iPhone and Apple TV
description: The Mudra Band adds gesture control to your iPhone, Mac and more thanks to a smart Apple Watch strap.

title: Entire Brazilian population potentially put at risk by major data leak
description: Yet another unprotected database was recently discovered, but this one held private info on virtually every Brazilian citizen.

title: Honda unveils striking new 0 Series that completely rethinks its EV future
description: Honda unveils the Space-Hub and Saloon concept vehicles at CES 2024, which will form part of its new 0 Series of electric vehicles.

title: Buyer beware: scammers are selling useless Nvidia RTX 4090 graphics cards that can’t actually play games
description: There’s a history of scams with high value GPUs, but the latest sting is one that’s a real eye-opener.

title: Every single spec for every Samsung Galaxy S24 model has just leaked
description: This is the most detailed specs list yet that's leaked for the Samsung Galaxy S24, S24 Plus, and Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.

title: HBO's The Last of Us lands No One Will Save You's Kaitlyn Dever for huge season 2 role
description: HBO's hugely popular TV adaptation has founds its Abby, and it's an unusual but great choice.

title: Interactive mystery Immortality is finally coming to PS5
description: Half Mermaid Productions has announced that Immortality, its interactive cinematic trilogy, is finally coming to PS5.

title: Bizarre 'Pokémon with guns' game Palworld is coming to early access on PC and Xbox next week
description: Palworld is set to release in early access on Steam and Xbox Series X|S on January 19.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 senior dev discusses players' feelings towards Act 3 'this shift is something that's challenging to overcome'
description: It's fair if you don't like Act 3 in Baldur's Gate 3, says senior developer, 'each act has its own flavour'.

title: Helldivers 2 crossplay announced alongside some pretty demanding PC specs
description: Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead Game Studios confirms the shooter will have crossplay, and reveals the game's PC specs.

title: Valve softens its stance on AI-generated content, opening the floodgates to ‘the vast majority of games that use it’ on Steam
description: Valve has published new guidance that allows AI generated content in games released on Steam.

title: Dropshare Cloud is shutting down for macOS users
description: Dropshare will continue to offer its apps for $39, but you’ll have to source cloud storage elsewhere.

title: HPE confirms $14bn Juniper Networks deal
description: HPE looks to "accelerate AI-driven innovation" with Juniper Networks deal.

title: Acer reveals Predator and Nitro Radeon RX 7000 GPUs as it steps more confidently into third-party graphics at CES 2024
description: Acer reveals Predator and Nitro Radeon RX 7000 GPUs as it steps more confidently into third-party graphics at CES 2024

title: Hisense’s massive 110-inch TV tops a mostly mini-LED lineup for 2024
description: Hisense's new TVs for 2024 include 110- and 98-inch additions to its flagship ULED X series, plus a budget 100-inch QLED model.

title: Kohler's new smart shower technology nearly made me indecently expose myself at CES
description: Kohler's CES 2024 stand recreated the giant, luxurious bathroom and spa of my dreams, debuting new products and smart home wellness experiences.

title: The Rabbit r1 is an AI-powered sidekick that's like a future version of Siri
description: The r1 houses a LAM model that gives users the ability to automate tasks by creating digital 'rabbit assistants.

title: Quordle today – hints and answers for Wednesday, January 10 (game #716)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
